sense.gloss: to cut down, to chop down, to fell

sdata.j: ここの↑木↑↓き↓を↑全部|↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑切↑↓き↓り↑倒↑↓たお↓す|つもりなのですか。
sdata.e: Are you going to cut down all the trees here?

sdata.j: ↑木↑↓き↓こりは↑木↑↓き↓を↑斧↑↓おの↓で|↑切↑↓き↓り↑倒↑↓たお↓す|。
sdata.e: The woodcutter fells a tree with an ax.

sdata.j: ↑木↑↓き↓は↑全部|↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑切↑↓き↓り↑倒↑↓たお↓す|つもりなの？
sdata.e: Are you going to cut down all the trees?
